entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-03-27
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Optimize redundant `HasValue` check in patterns #60413

PullRequests

Created

  • Do not recommend `async` if such modifier is already present #60412
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Merge main to features/vs2022-theme #60410
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Merge main to features/snappy/nodelay #60409
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts

Merged

  • Merge main-vs-deps to release/dev17.3 #60414
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main-vs-deps to release/dev17.3 #60314
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #60398
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts, Next
  • Move tests to different assembly to address combined string length issue #60395
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Merge main to features/semi-auto-props #60408
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/required-members #60407
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/list-patterns #60406
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

Updated

  • Add feature to convert from top-level-statements to Program.Main form #60383
    Area-IDE
  • Move StackTraceAnalyzer over to VirtualCharSequence #60404
    Area-IDE
  • Delay async taggers and navbars for files that are not visible #60367
    Area-IDE
  • Increase delay for getting compilation-available notifications from OOP #60369
    Area-IDE
  • Avoid checking HasValue in nullable comparison for non-default constants #60405
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Highlight `await` and `return` in top-level statements #60401
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Fix a race condition in IDE diagnostic service for stale diagnostics #60365
    Area-IDE, 17.2.P2
